page.title: 11Tates Coaches.Markyate
page.content: They started their own tours four or five years ago and now often go abroad.The general demand for tours abroad is to France, Germany, Holland, Belguim and Austria. The furthest they have ever been is Barcelona in Spain. When they interview drivers the first quality they want is for them to be clean, neat and tidy because Tates coaches feel their drivers should always be reasonably tidy, even if they are only taking local children to the swimming pool.They should also be polite and pleasant.Then they look at their driving records and they prefer someone experienced.They do not plan to expand but over the years they probably will.
